name: com.unity.cloud.assets
description: Unity Cloud Assets makes it easy to discover, create, update, delete, and manage Unity assets through the Assets service interface.

_upm.changelog:
### Added
- Added overload `IAssetRepository.GetAssetAsync(ProjectDescriptor, AssetId, string, CancellationToken)` to get an asset by asset id and label.
- Added `Unity_Editor` in `AssetType` enum.

### Changed
- Changed rate limitation for endpoints related to file uploading to prevent error when bulk uploading file to the same asset.

samples.description: Sample project demonstrating how to use the Asset Manager service.
Manage the asset collections in a project.
Define and manage the field definitions of an organization.
